name: Dream Haunter
description:
Dream Haunter is a short Point & Click where you control a ghost who have to awake his victim by finding what this one fears the most and putting that source of fear in his nightmares.

----------------------------------------------

Controls : Left mouse click for everything

----------------------------------------------

This game was made in 1 week (mostly during 2-3 days) for the CFN Halloween Jam 2. 

(Others games made during this Jam : Cfn-Halloween-Jam)

Theme : "Nightmares"
